name: Cosmic Dig Kit by Big Discoveries - Explore The Planets of The Solar System with Gem & Fossil Excavation Kits for Kids | STEM Toy Science Dig Kits with Gemstones for Boys and Girls
short_description: Explore the Solar System - Each kit lets kids unearth gems and fossils while discovering fascinating facts about the planets. Perfect for aspiring astronomers and paleontologists ages 6+.
Educational and Fun - Combines hands-on digging with learning, featuring an educational poster on planetary science, gems, and fossils. A fun way to engage in STEM activities.
Complete Excavation Kit - Includes one planet, educational poster, and set of dig tools (chisel & brush), making it easy to reveal the hidden treasures within each planet-shaped block.
Collect Them All - Available in designs representing all 8 planets of our Solar System. Each kit offers a unique explorer badge to celebrate the successfully excavated treasure.
Gift of Discovery - An ideal gift for kids interested in science, outer space, geology, and archaeology. One of the perfect toys for birthdays, holidays, and educational presents.
product_description: Embark on an interstellar adventure with Cosmic Dig Kits from Big Discoveries! Designed to inspire and educate, these planet-shaped excavation kits offer kids a hands-on approach to learning about the wonders of our Solar System and the mysteries of geology. Each kit contains five hidden gems or fossils waiting to be discovered, providing a thrilling excavation experience. With the included digging tools—a chisel and a brush—budding scientists can carefully uncover the treasures, just like a real paleontologist or geologist. But the discovery doesn't end there. Each Cosmic Dig Kit comes with an educational poster filled with intriguing facts about the represented planet, as well as information on the gems and fossils found within. This enriches each digging session with valuable knowledge, linking it to broader scientific concepts and sparking curiosity about the universe. Furthermore, the excitement of unearthing hidden gems is enhanced by the inclusion of a unique explorer badge, making each find a rewarding achievement. Collect all 8 kits to complete your journey across the Solar System, from the rocky inner planets to the gas giants. Ideal for children aged 6 and up, these kits are perfect for science projects, party favors, or a rainy day activity. They also make excellent gifts for kids who love space, science, and hands-on activities. Whether for a birthday, holiday, or as a special treat, Cosmic Dig Kits from Big Discoveries promise endless hours of educational exploration.

product_description: Premium Fossil Digging Kit for Kids to Inspire any Young Scientist! This kit includes three different digging themes: REAL DINOSAUR FOSSILS - Kids will discover 5 real dinosaur fossils! 2 tyrannosaurus teeth, 1 tyrannosaurus claw and 2 lava stones! 3D T-REX SKELETON – Your Kids will dig several dinosaur bones up which can assemble 3D T-rex skeleton 6 Dino eggs – Children will find different small dinosaur figures inside. Maybe find a T-rex, Dilophosaurus, Ankylosaurus and much more! This science kit includes: 6 X Dino eggs: A Different Animal in Each Egg! 1 X Dinosaur head fossil containing 2 tyrannosaurus teeth, 1 tyrannosaurus claw & 2 lava stones! 1 X dig brick containing dinosaur bones that can assemble 3D T-rex skeleton. 1 X Hammer 1 X Brush 1 X Chisel 1 X Chisel 1 X Magnifier glass How to play? Put brick/Dino Eggs on an easy to clean surface or on a big sheet of paper. Dig it up with the chisel and hammer to get the fossil, bones and dinosaurs out. Use the brush to sweep the dust off and clean the specimen. And now your kids can enjoy your findings. They can start their fossil collection, assemble a 3D T-REX SKELETON or play with the dinosaurs they just dig up. It will be a great gift and party activity.

product_description: Embark on an exciting paleontological adventure with this 2-in-1 Dinosaur Activity Kit featuring the mighty Triceratops from the Mesozoic era! Perfect for young scientists ages 6 and up, this comprehensive kit combines the thrill of discovery with hands-on learning. Kids can experience the excitement of a real dig as they uncover dinosaur pieces, then bring history to life by assembling their very own Triceratops model. The kit offers two engaging activities - first the archaeological excavation process, followed by the rewarding challenge of building and displaying their prehistoric creation. This educational toy set helps develop patience, fine motor skills, and scientific curiosity while teaching children about one of the most fascinating creatures from the Cretaceous period. The detailed Triceratops model showcases the distinctive three-horned skull and magnificent neck frill that made this dinosaur species so remarkable. Transform your child's interest in dinosaurs into an immersive learning experience that combines fun with scientific discovery!
